channel.title: Good Coders[read]This is not a request for help! this is a very good opportunity
channel.description:
Hello, Since there are so much "Noobs" here on the MoparScape Forums I have decided to start a "Server Coding BootCamp." Basically I need 3 Teachers because it will be like an online school.
First of all I need Three Teachers ;D
Apply with this format: [code] [b]Name:[/b] [b]Coding XP:[/b] [b]Proof:[/b] [b]Position wanted:[/b] Example: Classroom1 [/code]
[b]Key:[/b] Classroom #1 = Beginner Coders to be taught the basics Classroom #2 = Alright Coders to be taught cases and commands Classroom #3 = Finishing Up Coders to be taught how to add global objects, Add Voids, And Other Finishing Up Skills.
[center][b]Teachers:[/b][/center] Super Intendant: Got Java? Teacher Of CR1: Whitey b Teacher Of CR2: I am Noob Teacher Of CS3: FrugooScape

Coding XP: …
Proof: look at meh dev
Position wanted: put me where ya want me[/quote]
If your were someone i didn’t know i would require more proof but i know your proof
Accepted Classroom 2[br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2007, 11:57:46 AM[/size][hr][quote=“frugoo scape, post:17, topic:126678”]I guess i could be a teacher.
I have a wiki we can use for this =p.
http://frugooscape.net/wiki[/quote]Accepted for classroom 3 BTW your awesome

[quote=“mage_owner, post:14, topic:126678”][quote author=Got Java? link=topic=177290.msg1625208#msg1625208 date=1185293675]

I would teach, but i cba…I will take part of the course…CR3 lol…In Cr2 and Cr1, ADD would hit me fast…
[/quote]Are you wanting to teach? i don’t understand

Its ok…I wouldn’t understand anyways…I stopped to watch cartoons halfway through writing it.
I’m not gonna teach, but i might take classroom 3 lol[/quote]
Oh Lol well we arn’t opening untell we have 3 teachers :S

item.dc:creator: @Got_Java Got Java?
item.description:
@Got_Java wrote:

[quote=“Whitey b, post:2, topic:126678”]Name: Whitey
Coding XP: Full Source Coding, Plenty of Server Additions.
Proof: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,177287.0.html, http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,177286.0.html, http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,176408.0.html, http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,177020.0.html
Position wanted: Classroom #2[/quote]
Most of this Proof is stuff you leeched. You will have to wait before i Decline or accept

zoltanman:

I would’t start this, just give them link’s to java tutorials, and if they don’t want to read them, then so be it.

Well this has a 1 on 1 with a coder to a noob helping them code…Alot easier to go through with when someone is helping you

Read full topic

@Got_Java wrote:

Hello,
Since there are so much “Noobs” here on the MoparScape Forums I have decided to start a “Server Coding BootCamp.” Basically I need 3 Teachers because it will be like an online school.

First of all I need Three Teachers ;D

Apply with this format:

[b]Name:[/b]
[b]Coding XP:[/b]
[b]Proof:[/b]
[b]Position wanted:[/b] Example: Classroom1

Key:
Classroom #1 = Beginner Coders to be taught the basics
Classroom #2 = Alright Coders to be taught cases and commands
Classroom #3 = Finishing Up Coders to be taught how to add global objects, Add Voids, And Other Finishing Up Skills.

[center]Teachers:[/center]
Super Intendant: Got Java?
Teacher Of CR1: Whitey b
Teacher Of CR2: I am Noob
